contents.contents: Walk along the “Rue Saint Thibault”. At some point on your left, you will find a spot from where you can contemplate the Abbey of the Cordelières.

contents.alt: Photo of the abbey of the Cordelières

contents.contents: It was a large hospital outside the town ramparts

question.contents: Do you have an idea how much it cost to be treated in that hospital?

explanations.contents: Poor people and pilgrims were taken care of for free. Today, some documents are kept there.
